recipe.title: Coconut Chutney
recipe.ingredients: 100g desiccated coconut Juice of ½ lemon (or 1 tbsp lemon juice) 1 small garlic clove ¼ red onion, diced 2 generous pinches of sugar Optional nut milk

method.step: Put diced red onion in water to reduce pungency if preferred
Add all ingredients into a blender and pulse until combined
Add pinches of sugar if onion still too pungent
Add nut milk and blend for creamier consistency if desired
